title: UrlCodec
contents:
API > @angular/common > @angular/common/upgrade
mode_edit code

UrlCodeclink

A codec for encoding and decoding URL parts.

abstract class UrlCodec { abstract encodePath(path: string): string abstract decodePath(path: string): string abstract encodeSearch(search: string | { [k: string]: unknown; }): string abstract decodeSearch(search: string): {...} abstract encodeHash(hash: string): string abstract decodeHash(hash: string): string abstract normalize(href: string): string abstract areEqual(valA: string, valB: string): boolean abstract parse(url: string, base?: string): {...} }
